post.title: jailbreak matrix (jailbreak or unlock anything after 2.x)
post.content: ok been doing so many phones and touches for everyone, i put together a jailbreaking matrix this should help everyone locate what they need for whatever version of itouch or iphone you have. basically its an all in one page where you can find a guide and firmware file on howto unlock and jailbreak any iphone or itouch from firmware 2.x to 3.1.3 i cant post the 100+ links in here for the firmware and guides so i will post the link to the site. www.jailbreakmatrix.com let me know if you guys have any problems...
